Let's reintergrate every Missing Child of the country with their families

?

You may contact police at 100 and CHILDLINE at 1098
You are adviced to inform the nearest police station.
Its mandatory for police to register FIR in case of missing child.
Please provide maximum accurate information about the child. Probability of finding the child will increase.
